"The Dark Knight Rises" is a highly acclaimed superhero film that builds upon "The Dark Knight" (2008) also directed by Nolan, which stars Heath Ledger as the Joker.
In "The Dark Knight Rises", Batman and his allies have taken over Gotham City after months of fighting against various criminals. However, it is revealed that the mastermind behind all these crimes is none other than the Joker himself.
